content: The capital of France is Paris. William Shakespeare wrote the play 'Hamlet'. Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system. The Eiffel Tower is one of the most famous landmarks in Paris. The Mona Lisa, painted by Leonardo da Vinci, is housed in the Louvre Museum in Paris. The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second. The Great Wall of China is one of the Seven Wonders of the World. The Amazon Rainforest is known as the 'lungs of the Earth' due to its vast vegetation. Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.
